name: Robert F. Kennedy Center for Justice & Human Rights Reviews

review.title: “Good”
review.pros: Pros – Caring, passionate people working together in a positive environment to promote human rights. The office is a decent size for the amount of work done there, and the overall layout promotes a sense of camaraderie. Wide range of age among the workers.
review.cons: Cons – Not much explicit instruction, but this could be a pro if you do not like to be micromanaged. Would be nice to have more team-based projects.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend
